original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2501)@  武將召喚七顆守護星辰，當武將體力歸零時，回復75%的體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2501)@ The military commander summons seven guardian stars. When the military commander's physical strength returns to zero, he will recover 75% of his physical strength.
